content:
A mixture of CoCl2·6H2O (0.25 mmol, 59.5 mg), H2ADA (0.25 mmol, 63.3 mg), and px2ampy (0.25 mmol, 72.5 mg) in H2O/MeOH (10:2) was stirred for 30 min and sealed in a 25 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave (pH = 7.20). The reaction mixture was heated at 130 °C for 4 days and then slowly cooled to room temperature. Deep red block crystals were obtained. Yield: 47.6% (based on Co). Anal. Calcd for C46H50Co2N4O8 (M r = 904.76): C, 61.06%; H, 5.57%; N, 6.19%. Found: C, 62.25%; H, 5.73%; N, 6.73%. IR (KBr pellet, cm–1): 3391, 3369, 2915, 2895, 1616, 1578, 1539, 1441, 1402, 1331, 1145, 1013, 767, 684, 438.

Synthesis of {Cd(ADA)­(px2ampy)<sub>0.5</sub>}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>2</bold>)

The same synthetic method as that for compound 1 was used to obtain the compound 2, except that CoCl2·6H2O was replaced by CdCl2·H2O (0.25 mmol, 59.5 mg) and methanol was not added in the reaction mixture. Block-shaped colorless crystals of 2 were collected in 59% yield (based on Cd). Anal. Calcd for C23H27CdN2O4 (M r = 507.88): C, 54.39%; H, 5.35%; N, 5.51%. Found: C, 55.02%; H, 5.74%; N, 5.12%. IR (KBr pellet, cm–1): 3408, 3237, 2899, 1665, 1614, 1588, 1535, 1440, 1385, 1327, 1164, 967, 792, 712.

Synthesis of {Co<sub>2</sub>(IPTA)<sub>2</sub>­(px2ampy)}<italic toggle="yes"> <sub>n</sub> </italic> (<bold>3</bold>)

The same synthetic procedure, as that of compound 1, was followed to obtain the compound 3 except ligand H2IPTA (0.25 mmol, 41.5 mg) was used in place of H2ADA, and pH of the solution was maintained at 8.00. Blue block crystals of 3 were obtained in 45% yield (based on Co). C34H26Co2N4O8 (M r = 736.45): C, 55.45%; H, 3.558%; N, 7.607%. Found: C, 55.71%; H, 3.83%; N, 7.36%. IR (KBr pellet, cm–1): 3352, 3193, 2850, 1684, 1450, 1340, 1234, 1102, 825, 752, 692, 654.

Synthesis of {Mn(IPTA)­(px3ampy)}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>4</bold>)

We synthesized the compound 4 following the similar synthetic pathway as above using the Mn(OAc)2·4H2O (0.25 mmol, 61.25 mg), H2IPTA (0.25 mmol, 41.5 mg), and px3ampy (0.25 mmol, 72.5 mg). Light pink color crystals were filtered off with 60% yield (based on Mn). C26H19MnN4O4 (M r = 506.39): C, 61.67%; H, 3.781%; N, 11.063%. Found: C, 61.21%; H, 3.56%; N, 10.87%. IR (KBr pellet, cm–1): 3340, 2967, 2863, 1710, 1475, 1354, 1210, 1150, 995, 845, 754, 698, 649.
clean_text:
Synthesis of {Co2(ADA)2(px2ampy)} n  (1)

A mixture of CoCl2⋅6H2O (0.25 mmol, 59.5 mg), H2ADA (0.25 mmol, 63.3 mg), and px2ampy (0.25 mmol, 72.5 mg) in H2O/MeOH (10:2) was stirred for 30 min and sealed in a 25 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave (pH = 7.20). The reaction mixture was heated at 130 °C for 4 days and then slowly cooled to room temperature. Deep red block crystals were obtained. Yield: 47.6% (based on Co). Anal. Calcd for C46H50Co2N4O8 (M r = 904.76): C, 61.06%; H, 5.57%; N, 6.19%. Found: C, 62.25%; H, 5.73%; N, 6.73%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3391, 3369, 2915, 2895, 1616, 1578, 1539, 1441, 1402, 1331, 1145, 1013, 767, 684, 438.

Synthesis of {Cd(ADA)(px2ampy)0.5} n  (2)

The same synthetic method as that for compound 1 was used to obtain the compound 2, except that CoCl2⋅6H2O was replaced by CdCl2⋅H2O (0.25 mmol, 59.5 mg) and methanol was not added in the reaction mixture. Block-shaped colorless crystals of 2 were collected in 59% yield (based on Cd). Anal. Calcd for C23H27CdN2O4 (M r = 507.88): C, 54.39%; H, 5.35%; N, 5.51%. Found: C, 55.02%; H, 5.74%; N, 5.12%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3408, 3237, 2899, 1665, 1614, 1588, 1535, 1440, 1385, 1327, 1164, 967, 792, 712.

Synthesis of {Co2(IPTA)2(px2ampy)} n  (3)

The same synthetic procedure, as that of compound 1, was followed to obtain the compound 3 except ligand H2IPTA (0.25 mmol, 41.5 mg) was used in place of H2ADA, and pH of the solution was maintained at 8.00. Blue block crystals of 3 were obtained in 45% yield (based on Co). C34H26Co2N4O8 (M r = 736.45): C, 55.45%; H, 3.558%; N, 7.607%. Found: C, 55.71%; H, 3.83%; N, 7.36%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3352, 3193, 2850, 1684, 1450, 1340, 1234, 1102, 825, 752, 692, 654.

Synthesis of {Mn(IPTA)(px3ampy)} n  (4)

We synthesized the compound 4 following the similar synthetic pathway as above using the Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O (0.25 mmol, 61.25 mg), H2IPTA (0.25 mmol, 41.5 mg), and px3ampy (0.25 mmol, 72.5 mg). Light pink color crystals were filtered off with 60% yield (based on Mn). C26H19MnN4O4 (M r = 506.39): C, 61.67%; H, 3.781%; N, 11.063%. Found: C, 61.21%; H, 3.56%; N, 10.87%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3340, 2967, 2863, 1710, 1475, 1354, 1210, 1150, 995, 845, 754, 698, 649.
